org.ametiste.metrics.statsd.client

Class SimpleStatsDClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ametiste.metrics.statsd.client.SimpleStatsDClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatsDClient

    public class SimpleStatsDClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatsDClient
    Simple StatsDClient implementation with non-blocking send with help of ExecutorService via StatsDSocket
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleStatsDClient(StatsDSocket socket, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor, ErrorMode mode)
      This constructor should be used when alternative StatsDSocket and executor are required.
      SimpleStatsDClient(java.lang.String hostname, int port, ErrorMode mode)
      This constructor serves as default implementation of SimpleStatsDClient, based on default executor and DatagramStatsDSocket.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleStatsDClient

        public SimpleStatsDClient(java.lang.String hostname,
                          int port,
                          ErrorMode mode)
        This constructor serves as default implementation of SimpleStatsDClient, based on default executor and DatagramStatsDSocket. In case if alternative implementation is required, SimpleStatsDClient(StatsDSocket, ExecutorService, ErrorMode) should be used
        Parameters:
        hostname - - name or ip of host to connect
        port - - port to connect
        mode - - mode of connection. ErrorMode.MODERATE provides a silent error-prone mode, with only log warning message in case of not successful connection. ErrorMode.STRICT throws exception in case if connection is not successful

      • SimpleStatsDClient

        public SimpleStatsDClient(StatsDSocket socket,
                          java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor,
                          ErrorMode mode)
        This constructor should be used when alternative StatsDSocket and executor are required.
        Parameters:
        socket - - StatsDSocket implementation. Cant be null.
        executor - - ExecutorService for non-blocking send uses. NB! Default executor service uses thread factory with custom thread name, custom executor with different naming might trouble tracing. Cant be null.
        mode - - mode of connection. ErrorMode.MODERATE provides a silent error-prone mode, with only log warning message in case of not successful connection. ErrorMode.STRICT throws exception in case if connection is not successful. Cant be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if at least one of passed parameters is null

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Init method providing connect to socket
        Throws:
        StatsDSocketConnectException - if StatsDSocket.connect() threw exception and mode is ErrorMode.STRICT

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Destroy method providing close of socket and executor proper shutdown
